I can confirm that this is working. For the ones complaining about it, if you'd just learn to read readme files we wouldn't have to listen to you complain, but here is how to get this DLC working 100%.

First install the Borderlands 2 1.5.0 update/crack from rylgmr06
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8387720/Borderlands.2.Update.v1.5.0.Cracked

After it's installed use the extractor to extract the files and copy them to your Borderlands 2 install directory and let it copy+replace all. 

After that is done install this torrent, and use the extractor to extract it's files and once again copy the extracted files to your borderlands 2 install directory and let it copy + replace all. 

There you're done enjoy your Krieg and updated Borderlands 2!

thanks for the super quick upload, works perfectly with the update mentioned in the comments above.  Really shady of 2k to include the dlc in the update then charge you for the dlc unlocker , some people have to pay for bandwith and i bet half the update is the character models and his costumes.  Sadly the character kinda sucks.  Gaining health from kills is nice, but usually not needed until its almost too dangerous to use the skill.  The skill trees aren't varied much and require damage to yourself for the best damage output, and when the psycho skill is active your only distance weapon is your axe, which is nearly impossible to hit with, does little damage and has to return to your hand before throwing again, making it one of the slowest weapons in the game.  Not worth the purchase but give it a try yourself and see what you think.
How can you even complain about it being in the update? That is the ONLY way to distribute this DLC, otherwise you wouldnt be able to play online with people who own Krieg.
